name: Star Fighter (itch) (ansimuz)
description:
An Stylized Game Assets Pack in an 80's Style made in Pixel-Art.

Make your Space Shooter game for personal or commercial purposes. No credit required.

You will find in the downloadable files:

  • 4 Spaceship models for the Player spaceship.
  • Different Asteroids in size and shape
  • A Background at a 420 x 240 proportion
  • Explosion and Bullet VFX
  • 2 Music tracks and some sound effects

You can use the Godot Project on your own game.

-----------------------

GAME CONTROLS

-----------------------

Move: Arrow keys /WASD

Shoot: Spacebar

Thrust: Shift
